blogPost.excerpt: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!
blogPost.body: Alinea is a mobile investing app for the next generation. We match you to stocks based on your interests and offer bite-sized insights so you can invest in the companies you believe in. Join the waitlist to reserve a spot!
blogPost.title: Alinea - Invest in stocks you believe in
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Alinea是一款面向下一代的移动投资应用。我们根据您的兴趣为您匹配股票，并提供比特大小的见解，让您可以投资您相信的公司。加入候补名单，预约名额!
Alinea是一款面向下一代的移動投資應用。我們根據您的興趣爲您匹配股票，並提供比特大小的見解，讓您可以投資您相信的公司。加入候補名單，預約名額!

previous.excerpt: Remove objects from a video in less than 2 min using AI. ✂️ Remove dynamic objects, peoples, watermarks ✨ Add filters, turn your video into photos, GIF, audios 👋 Publish it in one click to seven platforms 🔎 Smart library to store your clips ✅ Try it for free
previous.title: Evanesco - Free AI-Powered Dynamic Object Remover for Creators

localize.description: 使用人工智能在2分钟内从视频中删除对象。✂️删除动态对象、人物、水印 ✨添加滤镜，将你的视频变成照片、GIF、音频 👋一键发布到七大平台 🔎智能库存储你的剪辑 ✅免费试一下吧
localize.tagline: 为创造者提供免费的人工智能动态对象清除器。

localize.description: 使用人工智能在2分鐘內從視頻中刪除對象。✂️刪除動態對象、人物、水印 ✨添加濾鏡，將你的視頻變成照片、GIF、音頻 👋一鍵發佈到七大平臺 🔎智能庫存儲你的剪輯 ✅免費試一下吧
localize.tagline: 爲創造者提供免費的人工智能動態對象清除器。

next.excerpt: Headlime’s Artificial Intelligence helps you write your articles, no matter what language they need to be in. Write with confidence knowing that every word is guaranteed to sound great and grammar-error-free.
next.title: Blog Assistant by Headlime - GPT3-powered blog editor that cures writer's block.
